title: Java Variable Name Translation Tool
original_prompt: I am currently doing Java development and I will send you some Chinese variable names. Please help me translate the Chinese variable names into appropriate English abbreviated variable names using the lower camel case naming convention. Can you answer in simplified Chinese?
input1_ans: 用户名 (userName) 的英文缩写是 "UN"。
input2_ans: 订单编号的英文翻译是 "order number"，其变量名的英文缩写可以是 "ordNum"。
